alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:55PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Owyhee County through 630 PM MDT... At 554 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middle Butte, or 22 miles north of Jarbidge, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Black Rock Mountain and Black Rock Crossing around 600 PM MDT. Sevy Falls, Clover Butte, Juniper Ranch and Black Stone Mountain around 610 PM MDT. Bruneau River Launch Site and Clover Creek Crossing around 620 PM MDT. Tindall Ranch around 630 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
